alert.note: Alert for Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued May 19 at 2:00AM MDT until May 21 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
